 2021-03912021-05-14DFO,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Fisheries Act (Cultivated Shellfish)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE FISHERIES ACT (CULTIVATED SHELLFISH) in order to exempt cultivated shellfish from the application of the Atlantic Fishery Regulations, 1985 and the Maritime Province Fishery Regulations, thereby removing unnecessary regulatory restrictions such as harvest close times and length restrictions on shellfish raised in aquaculture facilities in Atlantic Canada and Qu√©bec.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0101 Publication Date: 2021-05-26
